task: Search for the word \"sustainability\" on the Cambridge Dictionary, what is the translation of sustainability into Chinese and French in the dictionary.
Search for the word \"sustainability\" on the Cambridge Dictionary, what is the translation of sustainability into Chinese and French in the dictionary.
user_action_and_explanation: type "sustainability" into the search bar with the placeholder "Search English–Chinese (Traditional)" to find the translation.
observation: The user has successfully found the translation of the word "sustainability" into Traditional Chinese on the Cambridge Dictionary website. The translation for "sustainability" in Traditional Chinese is "可持續性" or "永續性". However, the user still needs to find the French translation, as the current page is set to English–Chinese (Traditional) translations only.
